summary: An Ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 18723, entitled, "An Ordinance appropriating the sum of Thirteen Thousand Seven Hundred Dollars ($13.700.00), or so much thereto as may be necessary from the General Fund, to aid in the improvement of East Fortieth Street, et al, by grading and curbing the same, etc. as provided for by Ordinance No. 16040, creating Local Improvement District No. 1505.
